content:
Hello,
I have a stream that has data posted to it by a script. The intent of the stream is to just be a searchable store of information for all users. Is there a way to a:make it read only b:globally mute and disable notifications for that stream.
thanks!

For the former, https://zulip.com/help/stream-sending-policy may be relevant, though the current limiting options are only full members and admins.
I'm not sure there's a standard way to enforce that users don't get notifications.

Thank you Neil. It did not appear that would satisfy the use case. I did find the answer I hope in the api documentation. I will test adding a section in my script to make the necessary notification changes before it refreshes the data. I -think- that will work. Again appreciate the response.
